prompts.label: Generate Architecture
prompts.command: Base on <current-idea-file> to generate layered architecture

prompts.label: Idea Reflection
prompts.command: Extra key points in <current-idea-file>, then create a sub-agent that uses these key points to learn from the project and give feedback to the idea file (the feedback should be critical but constructive), then you use the feedback to improve the idea.

prompts.label: Free Collaboration
prompts.command: Let's base on <current-idea-file> to collaborate, wait for my instructions.

evaluate.label: Evaluate Project Quality
evaluate.command: Evaluate project quality and generate report

refactoring.label: Refactor All
refactoring.command: Refactor all with reference to its code and <evaluation-file>

refactoring.label: Align Requirements to Features
refactoring.command: Update requirement docs to match current feature specification

refactoring.label: Align Features to Code
refactoring.command: Update feature specification docs to match current code implementation

refactoring.label: Align Tests to Code
refactoring.command: Update test cases to match current code implementation and reference <evaluation-file>

refactoring.label: Align Tracing + Tests to Features
refactoring.command: Update tracing decorators and tests to match current feature specification

refactoring.label: Refactor Code + Tracing + Tests
refactoring.command: Refactor code and tests to match current feature specification and reference <evaluation-file>
